Uses of Class
alix.lucene.analysis.tokenattributes.CharsAtt

  • Packages that use CharsAtt 
    Package Description
    alix.lucene.analysis
    Components for lexical analysis, especially for French.
    alix.lucene.analysis.tokenattributes
    Custom token attributes.
    alix.lucene.search
    Objects to search and calculate lexical statistics from an index (ex: found occurrences by facet)
    alix.util
    Generic data structures.
